reviews.Title: Mind-blowing purchase
reviews.Comment:
Pros
1. Superb display
2. Performance of processor is good enough for daily work and normal gaming.
3. No hang and lag till now.
4. Sound quality is average, not complaining about it so much.
5. Connectivity is also good.
6. Charging is fast with 44 watt charger and battery lasts in full day with normal use.
7. If you are not using flagship phone previously you will love the camera photos and videos with ois

Cons
Everything is working fine till now but charger should be at least 66 watt.
